mapper.sql: id, subjectName, status, creator, createDate, lastModDate, lastModifier
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO gk_subject ( subjectName, status, creator, createDate, lastModDate, lastModifier ) VALUES ( #{subjectName}, #{status}, #{creator}, #{createDate}, #{lastModDate}, #{lastModifier} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.update:
UPDATE gk_subject
subjectName = #{subjectName},
status = #{status},
creator = #{creator},
createDate = #{createDate},
lastModDate = #{lastModDate},
lastModifier = #{lastModifier},
WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE gk_subject
subjectName = #{map.subjectName},
status = #{map.status},
creator = #{map.creator},
createDate = #{map.createDate},
lastModDate = #{map.lastModDate},
lastModifier = #{map.lastModifier},
WHERE id = #{map.id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO gk_subject ( subjectName, status, creator, createDate, lastModDate, lastModifier ) VALUES ( #{map.subjectName}, #{map.status}, #{map.creator}, #{map.createDate}, #{map.lastModDate}, #{map.lastModifier} )
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM gk_subject
AND id like CONCAT('%', #{id} , '%')
AND subjectName like CONCAT('%', #{subjectName} , '%')
AND status like CONCAT('%', #{status} , '%')
AND creator like CONCAT('%', #{creator} , '%')
AND createDate like CONCAT('%', #{createDate} , '%')
AND lastModDate like CONCAT('%', #{lastModDate} , '%')
AND lastModifier like CONCAT('%', #{lastModifier} , '%')
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${sortBy}
